title: If you were a magical boy / girl , what would be your transformation theme song?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZS4j4JOufXA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uNZlaJLtaHI

And what would be your element?

I think I'd go with Ocean , like Sailor Neptune. {{champion:103}} 
Something about orientation-flexible + water = op
